title: My Broken Mariko
alternative_title: マイ・ブロークン・マリコ
status: マイ・ブロークン・マリコ
description:
Description :
        Mariko and Shii-chan have been friends since middle school, and have maintained their friendship over the years. But Shii-chan, now an OL, suddenly hears on the news that her friend has killed herself. In shock, Shii-chan searches for the reason... The reason why her broken friend had finally committed suicide.
This story deals with suicide and its aftermath, plus abuses of all kind that preceded it. Reader discretion is strongly advised.
National Suicide Prevention Lifeline (US):
1-800-273-8255

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 5: Extra: Home! Sweet Home!
Vol.1 Chapter 2: Let S Go - Hawaii
